name: benroyce
text:
@roytang

like you said: if you post something on the internet publicly, you should have no expectations about who sees it or not

but socially, it *feels* (it's emotional) like someone is taking your words in one room and broadcasting it in another without your acknowledgement

human psychology

regardless, salamat, and i agree with you

i hope this drama doesn't get ryan barrett down. he might consider relenting and doing opt in, *at first* strictly because it will kill the drama
